about_the_game:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel and get VAIL Combat to engage in high-intensity battles.

VAIL CITADEL (FREE-TO-PLAY)

Discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter with best-in-class mechanics, precisely tuned interactions, and immersive physics systems. Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, or discover the mysteries in the quarry — The Citadel is constantly being updated with new features and content.

ORE deposits are scattered throughout the Quarry waiting for you to mine in an all new CO-OP PVE mode. But be careful, because as soon as you start extracting the valuable ORE shards, an enemy is waiting to... give you a hug? ORE can be spent on exclusive cosmetics and to unlock VAIL Combat.

VAIL COMBAT (DLC)

Gain access to everything VAIL has to offer. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

Uncover VAIL's story as you traverse through awe-inspiring brutalist environments and the lines between right and wrong begin to blur.

BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE

VAIL Combat (DLC) will also include future game modes that are currently in development, such as an upcoming extraction mode.

CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Core i7-6700k / Ryzen 7 3700x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: All popular VR hardware supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Core-i7-12700k / Ryzen 9 3900x+
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: All popular VR hardware supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD or better
